description.value: You wrap the target in purifying flames. You can attempt to counteract a single poison or non-curse effect imparting the Clumsy, Dazzled, Enfeebled, Fatigued, Frightened, Paralyzed, Sickened, or Stupefied condition. The target can choose to empower the flames with their life force, becoming Drained{Drained 1} (or increasing their drained value by 1, if already under the condition) to grant you a +1 circumstance bonus to your counteract check.
